channel.title: RadLads
channel.description:
# RadLads
![image|526x500, 100%](upload://jJ8nKonJ0z1x9HC56fuATyIeOIp.png)
>RadLads is a collection of 10,000 Radical Lads on the Radix network. Each RadLad has a variety of traits and can have items that express their character. **Price of each NFT:** 25 XRD or 20 OCI **Links:** * [Website](https://radladsxrd.com/) **Social:** * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RadLadsXRD) * [Telegram](http://t.me/radladsxrd)

item.title: RadLads
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Important Announcement!
After a discussion with our community, we have decided to change the RadLad prices from 50XRD to 25XRD. All current holders will receive a random RadLad for each that they already hold. This also pushes us to almost 2000 Lads reserved.

Source: Twitter

We are also now accepting $OCI as payment for RadLads as requested by our community.

Source: Twitter

Read full topic
